Name: Sneiroball
About the game: Sneiroball - Drive Your Ball Defeat your opponent by rolling the ball into his goal. But that will not be enough. In addition, you will be given a large arsenal of weapons and interactive worlds for more dynamic and flexible strategies. Features • Map Editor. • Weapons / Character Skins. • Interactive locations. • Singleplayer / Multiplayer.

Meta Description: Looking for information on Sneiroball? Check out the release date (Jul 2018), developer insights from Sneirox, and a complete game summary.
